title: Was This White Fox Skinned Alive for Lady Gaga’s Fur Coat?
subtitle: Unrelated images of Lady Gaga in a (possibly fake) fur and a baby fox were circulated with messages claiming that this animal was skinned alive for the singer's wardrobe.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Photographs show a 7-month-old white fox that was skinned alive to make a fur coat for musician Lady Gaga.
